properties.publicRemarks:
Indulge in refined desert living with this newly renovated, impeccably furnished seasonal residence in the guard-gated Sun City Palm Desert Country Club. Designed for the sophisticated tenant, this beautiful home offers 2 bedrooms and 2 baths, styled to exceptional standards.

The interiors feature iconic furnishings from Eames, Vanguard, and Bernhardt, complemented by a newly painted palette, contemporary chandeliers, and an impressive private art collection. Every detail reflects comfort, style, and thoughtful design.

Retreat into the main bedroom suite featuring a soaking tub, Italian linens, upholstered reading chair, and armoire that enhances the seamless resort experience.

In addition to the main living spaces, the home offers a dedicated art studio and remote work office, complete with complimentary art supplies and office essentials — perfect for creativity, productivity, or both.

The open concept living and dining areas offer entertaining flow, while the gourmet kitchen is outfitted with new appliances and fully stocked for culinary pursuits.

Outdoor Living:  
Step into a private desert retreat for outdoor living. The private backyard features tailored furniture, a fire pit, stone coffee table, and a bronze bistro table, all situated within a designed hardscape. Surrounded by a manicured living desert garden and sculptures, the space offers multiple areas for lounging, dining, and relaxing.

Simply bring your personal belongings — everything else is thoughtfully prepared for your relaxed resort experience.  

Check out the amenities at Sun City 
Country Club here:  https://www.scpdca.com/

Availability:  
May 1, 2025 - October 31, 2025: $5500 per month; 
November 1 - December 31, 2025: $5500 per month;
January 2026 - April 2026: $5500 per month.
Deposit: $5500.  
Cleaning Fee: $350.  
Utilities are capped at $150/Mo.

properties.publicRemarks:
SUN CITY PALM DESERT.  LUXURIOUS San Remo Estate Home (3 bedroom plus 2 1/2 bath on a HUGE corner lot !. The back patio is like being in a 5 star resort!  Very private patio includes a beautiful salt water pebble tec pool, bubbling spa, separate rock waterfall, a  Built in BBQ unit and patio decking to accommodate sunny areas and shady areas under the patio . All while enjoying beautiful sunsets in a serene area within the community.   When walking in the double door entry, you are greeted with 18'' marble tiled floors, everywhere but the bedrooms and, many windows bringing your view out toward the lovely patio area.  The San Remo is a great floor plan which has the primary  suite on one side of the house with the other two bedrooms on the opposite side of the home with a full bath between them.  THIS is a floor plan IDEAL for ENTERTAINING or just finding your own comfy spot to ''chill''!
The primary bath is HUGE with a sumptuous tub, and a stall shower with two sinks and a HUGE custom closet to enjoy!  The bedroom has shuttered doors leading to the patio - with side panels that provide fresh air !  Also includes a king sized electric adjustable bed!
Huge great room with casual dining, comfortable sofas with a TV included.  Open to the kitchen with bar stools at the counter to enjoy  a fresh kitchen with Samsung SS Refrigerator with french door and  the extra drawer with  ice on the door, 5 burner range, GE Monogram SS dishwasher and Black Oven with microwave oven above the oven. Kitchen has granite counters with a gorgeous  ''Tommy Bahama like'' fan above! 
The secondary bedrooms are located with one of them facing the back patio and the other with a built in murphy bed along with a custom desk area provided.  
The laundry room includes LG washer and dryer, The ThinQ line with front load, lots of cabinets, counter for folding and a deep sink!
The  2 car garage with golf cart garage  has an epoxy coated flooring along with storage cabinets. The 2 zone AC units have been replaced , there is a 50 gallon hot water tank and there is also an automatic hot water recirculating tank so hot water is very quickly obtained!
Make this pristine home your own within one of the top retirement communities in the USA according to Money Magazine!

properties.publicRemarks: Located in the best 55+ community in the valley, Sun City Palm Desert, this St. Croix model is the most popular. It has 2 bedrooms, 2 baths, and a den, and an extra flex room with a Murphy bed. It has new carpet and new paint inside and out. The open floor plan allows fabulous golf course and mountain views from almost every room. The kitchen has a bay window, with a kitchenette, an island, and a peninsula bar. It has a view of the dining room, living room, and the golf course. The large master bedroom has an amazing view and a bathroom with a dual vanity, walk-in closet, walk-in shower, and a separate toilet room. The guest bedroom is adjacent to the 2nd full bathroom, and is very inviting. The home also has a den and ''hobby room'' for an office, or extra guest room. The laundry includes the washer and dryer, and it leads to the 2-car garage, and a separate golf cart garage. The courtyard and backyard have beautiful, easily maintained landscaping. The 180-degree view of the lush par 3, 3rd hole, of the Santa Rosa golf course and the gorgeous mountain range in the distance. SUN CITY PALM DESERT IS ALL ABOUT LIFESTYLE!! It has many clubs, activities, amenities, and low HOA dues. Play at 2 championship 18-hole golf courses and practice facilities, pickle ball, tennis, softball, bocci ball, an 18-hole miniature golf course, an honor library, arts and crafts, a ballroom for special entertainment, and 4 saltwater pools kept at 87 degrees with hot tubs. Enjoy 2 great restaurants, a martini/coffee bar, and even a post office. There is a newly renovated classy indoor/outdoor bar with fire tables to enjoy the awesome views and our beautiful desert weather. Don't miss this one.
